resources.string: 1. What are the names of the 4 rivers? (Choose one)
2. True or False? Tree of Life and the Tree of Knowledge of Good and Evil are the names of the two trees?
3. Which tree did God say not to eat of?
4. God took what from Man to make Woman?
5. True or False? God rested on the 6th Day.
6. What was created on the 4th Day?
Nile, Red Sea, Mediterranean Sea, Black Sea
Gulf of Aden, Gulf of Oman, Caspan Sea, Arabian Sea
